titles.title: To amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act to provide for the payment of rewards for information regarding acts of international terrorism in the United States.

bill.summary: 7/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to remove a condition that requires rewards for information regarding acts of international terrorism to be for acts committed primarily outside the territorial jurisdiction of the United States.
